# weekday {%= badge("fury") %}

> {%= description %}

{%= include("install-npm", {save: true}) %}

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Usage

```js
var weekday = require('weekday');
weekday();
//=> 'Sunday' (current day)

weekday('Sunday');
//=> '1'

weekday(1);
//=> 'Sunday'

weekday(4);
//=> 'Wednesday'
```
